housing.name: Philadelphia Housing Authority
housing.description: The Philadelphia Housing Authority provides affordable housing options to low-income families, seniors, and individuals with disabilities.
housing.eligibility: Income-based eligibility requirements apply. Generally available to Philadelphia residents with income below 80% of area median income.

food.name: Philabundance Food Bank
food.description: Philabundance is the largest hunger relief organization in the Delaware Valley, providing food to those in need and promoting long-term solutions to food insecurity.
food.hours: Distribution times vary by location. Check website for details.
food.eligibility: No eligibility requirements to receive food assistance.

health.name: Philadelphia Department of Public Health Centers
health.description: City health centers that provide primary care and preventive health services to Philadelphia residents regardless of their ability to pay.
health.eligibility: Open to all Philadelphia residents. Sliding fee scale based on income.
